name: Gemini Enhanced Text to Speech - 2 Speakers Dialog
description:
This advanced TTS tool transforms a simple text script into a dynamic, two-speaker conversational audio file using Google's Gemini TTS models.
It automatically analyzes the dialogue to select the most fitting voices for each speaker, or allows for precise manual control. A key feature is its ability to enhance the script with stylistic directions (e.g., "speak excitedly," "sound tired"), resulting in a significantly more natural and expressive performance. Ideal for creating engaging podcasts, dialogue for videos, or any application requiring realistic two-person conversations.
